Articles.Content:
Sparked by a beautiful Jool sunrise. That little probe brought all kinds of smiles to this face. Without further ado...

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/i-dream-in-gray

By the way, if you all ever need to contact me for any usage requests and such, shoot me an email here [email protected] or via Soundcloud I always forget to check my messages here.

Thanks!!
Forgot to mention, as always, let me know what you think. Enjoy!

I'm about as musical as a toddler with a broken drum so I have a great deal of respect for anyone who can play or compose music - and it also feels a bit odd to be commenting on a piece of music!

I liked it very much, although I found the two tone 'warning' sound at the beginning a little jarring. Once that fades out (around 1m 7 I think) the rest of the piece is lovely. Listening to 'No Heroes Here' whilst I'm writing this!

The intro sound was a hard pick. I wanted something odd to catch attention then to fade off as the song went more soft and flowing. Thanks! I am glad you liked the piece. BTW "No Heroes Here" is one of my favorites so far along with "Vampire Slayer".

I am hoping to find some company that can use these LOL.
